name: generate_veo3_prompt
description: Generate a cinematic video prompt for Veo3, in Wong Kar-wai style, matching the sleep music mood and brand aesthetic.

scene.description: The core visual scene (e.g., rainy street, window with glowing light, moonlight over sea).

camera_movement.description: Describe camera motion (e.g., slow pan, zoom-in, static wide shot).

style.description: Visual direction or film style (e.g., Wong Kar-wai, Blade Runner 2049).

color_palette.description: Preferred tones (e.g., midnight blue, deep purple, moonlight yellow).
